data.title: Friends & Family Pub Quiz Questions & Template
data.meta_description: Our Mentimeter Pub Quiz is the ultimate way to enjoy a classic English pastime from the comfort of your own home.
data.text:
Our Mentimeter Pub Quiz is the ultimate way to enjoy a classic English pastime from the comfort of your own home. Make sure to grab the snacks, a drink and have some with this Pub Quiz!

Far from a Trivial Pursuit

Going all the way back to his time living with the Dursleys all the way to his final showdown with the Dark Lord, the adventures of Harry Potter have provided countless children, adolescents and adults hours and hours of entertainment.

Whether you’re a fan of the silver screen Potter or prefer the Harry of the books, we have something to test the knowledge of even the most ardent fans.

How To Use This Template

To download this template and start having fun just click ‘Get template’ while logged into your account. If you need to sign up don’t worry as that only takes a few clicks.

To submit answers simply enter the voting code on menti.com or scan the QR code. It couldn’t be easier.

Our paid Mentimeter users can edit this template to their heart’s desire. Change slides, adjust questions and include additional teaching material. Free users can use our template and everyone can take some inspiration from our history trivia below.
